channel.title: Adding Models? Claws? Gs? Spirit Shields? pvp armour? pvp weps?
channel.description:
Really want to add claws, all godswords and spirit shields ect into my server but im not sure how to do it. could anyone help me or give me a link to another post that might be able to answer my question?
Oh yeah, my servers a 317

item.title: Adding Models? Claws? Gs? Spirit Shields? pvp armour? pvp weps?
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

1.Download the model
2.Add it to your client model folder
3.Add the ints for the item
4.Compile Client
5.Go to item.cfg in server
6.In the int that you made for the model find the item id you chose.
7.Change the name and stats and things to what you want. or you can create your own item id.
8.If you are adding your own item id, Go to equipment/Wearing and add the item id to the right place
For example:
Platebody: {“1121”}

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Models? Claws? Gs? Spirit Shields? pvp armour? pvp weps?

item.title: Adding Models? Claws? Gs? Spirit Shields? pvp armour? pvp weps?
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

hboy07:

thanks guys this helped. just need to code dragonfire shield and dragonplate now oh and how do you give the vesta longsword spec? because mine has a spec bar but no spec and also my dragon claws has a 100% spec bar and there are ONLY 2 specs but it only takes 25% of spec bar? any ideas?

Client.java sided.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Models? Claws? Gs? Spirit Shields? pvp armour? pvp weps?
item.dc:creator: @XxJtxX XxJtxX
item.description:
@XxJtxX wrote:

[quote=“Superd00d, post:3, topic:332261”][quote author=XxJtxX link=topic=428701.msg3147137#msg3147137 date=1268179165]
Add from your client and then edit your item.cfg in your server.

Things to edit in your client: class9.java and you must download the models, use the search button to find them. Then add the models into your Models folder.
[/quote]
Class8 is the correct class. Class8 is for custom items. You place ints in class 8, models in the models folder.[/quote]Sorry, my bad for false information ;), thanks for correcting.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Models? Claws? Gs? Spirit Shields? pvp armour? pvp weps?

item.title: Adding Models? Claws? Gs? Spirit Shields? pvp armour? pvp weps?
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

[quote=“XxJtxX, post:2, topic:332261”]Add from your client and then edit your item.cfg in your server.

Things to edit in your client: class9.java and you must download the models, use the search button to find them. Then add the models into your Models folder.[/quote]
Class8 is the correct class. Class8 is for custom items. You place ints in class 8, models in the models folder.

Read full topic

@XxJtxX wrote:

Add from your client and then edit your item.cfg in your server.

Things to edit in your client: class8.java and you must download the models, use the search button to find them. Then add the models into your Models folder.
